nodes.excerpt: This is a website with alcohol education and solutions, in partnership with over two dozen other independent brands who are working to raise the standards of the alcohol industry.

localize.tagline: 解读酒类行业（摘自豪斯和好伏特加）。

nodes.excerpt: The Chief of Staff Network is a private community connecting Chiefs of Staff from the fastest growing startups and enterprises. Our community meets in a trusted environment to learn from one another, exchange ideas and reach their full potential as leaders.
nodes.title: Chief of Staff Network - Community for Chiefs of Staff to accelerate their careers.
nodes.author: Scott Amenta

localize.description: 办公室主任网络是一个连接来自发展最快的初创企业和企业的办公室主任的私人社区。我们的社区在一个值得信赖的环境中聚会，相互学习，交流思想，充分发挥他们作为领导者的潜力。
localize.tagline: 为参谋长加快事业发展的社区。

localize.description: 辦公室主任網絡是一個連接來自發展最快的初創企業和企業的辦公室主任的私人社區。我們的社區在一個值得信賴的環境中聚會，相互學習，交流思想，充分發揮他們作爲領導者的潛力。

nodes.excerpt: ODD is an 8-week program for ambitious designers who want to hone their skills, increase their impact and become world-class design leaders – surrounded by a community of incredible peers.
nodes.title: On Deck Designer Fellowship - Turning designers into world-class design leaders
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: ODD是一个为期8周的项目，面向雄心勃勃的设计师，他们想要磨练自己的技能，增加自己的影响力，成为世界级的设计领袖-周围都是令人难以置信的同行社区。
localize.tagline: 让设计师成为世界级的设计领军人物

localize.description: ODD是一個爲期8周的項目，面向雄心勃勃的設計師，他們想要磨練自己的技能，增加自己的影響力，成爲世界級的設計領袖-周圍都是令人難以置信的同行社區。
localize.tagline: 讓設計師成爲世界級的設計領軍人物

nodes.excerpt: Exhausted with endless Zoom Meetings? Grapevine allows you to get asynchronous (one-way) video updates from your team each morning. Short one-way video updates help keep remote and local teams connected without having to schedule or attend in-person meetings.
nodes.title: Grapevine 2.0 - Schedule fewer zoom meetings with one-way video updates
nodes.author: Brandyn Morelli

localize.description: 被没完没了的变速会搞得筋疲力尽？Grapevine允许您每天早上从您的团队获取异步(单向)视频更新。简短的单向视频更新可帮助远程和本地团队保持联系，而无需安排或参加面对面会议。
localize.tagline: 通过单向视频更新安排更少的缩放会议

localize.description: 被沒完沒了的變速會搞得筋疲力盡？Grapevine允許您每天早上從您的團隊獲取異步(單向)視頻更新。簡短的單向視頻更新可幫助遠程和本地團隊保持聯繫，而無需安排或參加面對面會議。
localize.tagline: 通過單向視頻更新安排更少的縮放會議

nodes.excerpt: Become a certified email marketing expert with this flexible online learning platform. Join the MailerLite Academy, a series of free video courses that let you learn at your own pace. Designed for both beginners and advanced email marketers. See you in class!
nodes.title: Email Marketing Academy from MailerLite - Learning platform for email marketing expert certification
nodes.author: Indrė Sizovaitė

localize.description: 借助这个灵活的在线学习平台，成为经过认证的电子邮件营销专家。加入MailerLite学院，这是一系列免费视频课程，让您按照自己的节奏学习。专为初学者和高级电子邮件营销者设计。课堂上见！
localize.tagline: 电子邮件营销专家认证学习平台

localize.description: 藉助這個靈活的在線學習平臺，成爲經過認證的電子郵件營銷專家。加入MailerLite學院，這是一系列免費視頻課程，讓您按照自己的節奏學習。專爲初學者和高級電子郵件營銷者設計。課堂上見！
localize.tagline: 電子郵件營銷專家認證學習平臺

nodes.excerpt: Step aside fantasy football! There's a new way to play. Draft members of Congress for your team, score points from their actions, and get the most points during your season to win. Fantasy Congress is a blast with friends, and you might learn a thing or two!
nodes.title: Fantasy Congress - Fantasy sports for U.S. politics
nodes.author: Allison Seboldt

localize.description: 让开梦幻足球！这是一种新的玩法。为你的球队选拔国会议员，从他们的行动中获得分数，并在你的赛季中获得最多的分数才能获胜。幻想大会是与朋友们的狂欢，你可能会学到一两样东西！
localize.tagline: 美国政治的梦幻运动

localize.description: 讓開夢幻足球！這是一種新的玩法。爲你的球隊選拔國會議員，從他們的行動中獲得分數，並在你的賽季中獲得最多的分數才能獲勝。幻想大會是與朋友們的狂歡，你可能會學到一兩樣東西！
localize.tagline: 美國政治的夢幻運動

nodes.excerpt: A collection of free UX case studies, packed with actionable insights and occasional memes.
nodes.title: Built for Mars - A collection of UX case studies
nodes.author: Peter Ramsey

localize.description: 一个免费的用户体验案例研究的集合，充斥着可操作的洞察力和偶尔的表情包。
localize.tagline: 一组UX案例研究

localize.description: 一個免費的用戶體驗案例研究的集合，充斥着可操作的洞察力和偶爾的表情包。

nodes.excerpt: Learn Azure Fundamentals is an app which helps you to learn the basics of Microsoft Azure and Cloud Computing by answering questions in tests. App contains 14 unique tests, 269 questions, 132 articles. Learn offline. App is absolutely free. No Ads.
nodes.title: Learn Azure Fundmentals - Learn Microsfot Azure fundamentals by passing tests
nodes.author: Denis Kazakov

localize.description: 学习Azure基础知识是一款应用程序，它通过在测试中回答问题来帮助你学习Microsoft Azure和云计算的基础知识。APP包含14个独特的测试，269个问题，132篇文章。离线学习。APP是绝对免费的。没有广告。
localize.tagline: 通过测试学习Microsfot Azure基础知识

localize.description: 學習Azure基礎知識是一款應用程序，它通過在測試中回答問題來幫助你學習Microsoft Azure和雲計算的基礎知識。APP包含14個獨特的測試，269個問題，132篇文章。離線學習。APP是絕對免費的。沒有廣告。
localize.tagline: 通過測試學習Microsfot Azure基礎知識

nodes.excerpt: DoYouNotes helps students memorize their notes faster. How? 1. upload a PDF file 2. mark the sections to study 3. review the sections (recall/show/hide content, spaced repetition, order by urgency/randomly, self-evaluate) 4. check your progress
nodes.title: DoYouNotes - Memorize your notes faster
nodes.author: Massimo Cairo

localize.description: DoYouNotes帮助学生更快地记忆笔记。如何上传？1.上传PDF文件2.标记要学习的部分3.复习各部分(回忆/显示/隐藏内容、间隔重复、按紧急程度/随机排序、自我评估)4.检查您的进度
localize.tagline: 更快地记住你的笔记

localize.description: DoYouNotes幫助學生更快地記憶筆記。如何上傳？1.上傳PDF文件2.標記要學習的部分3.複習各部分(回憶/顯示/隱藏內容、間隔重複、按緊急程度/隨機排序、自我評估)4.檢查您的進度
localize.tagline: 更快地記住你的筆記

nodes.excerpt: Make Writing a Habit. Write for at least 10 minutes a day for the next 90 days. Tweet your progress each day with the #90DaysOfProse hashtag.
nodes.title: #90DaysOfProse - Make writing a habit
nodes.author: Daniel K. Hunter

localize.description: 让写作成为一种习惯。在接下来的90天里，每天至少写10分钟。每天用#90DaysOfProse 标签推特你的进展。
localize.tagline: 让写作成为一种习惯

localize.description: 讓寫作成爲一種習慣。在接下來的90天裏，每天至少寫10分鐘。每天用#90DaysOfProse 標籤推特你的進展。
localize.tagline: 讓寫作成爲一種習慣

nodes.excerpt: Gumroad University is a curated collection of interviews, challenges, guides, documentation, and workshops, designed to help creators get inspired, create something fantastic, and bring it to market sucessfully.
nodes.title: Gumroad University - A guided tour of our best resources by creators for creators

localize.description: GumRoad大学是一个精心策划的采访、挑战、指南、文档和研讨会的集合，旨在帮助创作者获得灵感，创造一些奇妙的东西，并成功地将其推向市场。
localize.tagline: 由创作者为创作者导览我们最好的资源

localize.tagline: 由創作者爲創作者導覽我們最好的資源

nodes.excerpt: PictureThis® identifies 1,000,000+ plants every day with 98% accuracy-better than most human experts. Get your gardening questions answered and become a “green thumb”! Simply take a photo of the plant and PictureThis answers all the questions for you!
nodes.title: PictureThis 2.0 - Instantly identify plants like a botanist in your pocket 🌱
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: PictureThis®每天识别1,000,000多种植物，准确率高达98%，比大多数人类专家都要好。让你的园艺问题得到解答，成为一名“园艺高手”！只需给植物拍张照片，就能为你解答所有问题！
localize.tagline: 立即识别您口袋中的植物，就像植物学家一样🌱

localize.description: PictureThis®每天識別1,000,000多種植物，準確率高達98%，比大多數人類專家都要好。讓你的園藝問題得到解答，成爲一名“園藝高手”！只需給植物拍張照片，就能爲你解答所有問題！
localize.tagline: 立即識別您口袋中的植物，就像植物學家一樣🌱

localize.description: 安置是每个人的人才代理。我们通过现代技术和人力支持帮助人们找到工作。通过你在Placement.com上的求职，你可以在飞翔上找到工作。

nodes.excerpt: Write concisely by substituting "very" + "adjective" with a more concise adjective that has the spirit of very contained within it.
nodes.title: Lose the Very - "Very good english" is not very good english. Lose the very.
nodes.author: Connor Callahan

localize.description: 用一个更简洁的形容词来代替“非常”+“形容词”，这样写起来就简洁了。
localize.tagline: “非常好的英语”不是很好的英语。失去最好的。

localize.description: 用一個更簡潔的形容詞來代替“非常”+“形容詞”，這樣寫起來就簡潔了。
localize.tagline: “非常好的英語”不是很好的英語。失去最好的。

nodes.excerpt: Download all sorts of goodies you can email to friends and family. Don't stroll the mall, scroll the list. Save lives by staying home and emailing your gifts to your favorite bootstrappers, self funders and indiehackers.
nodes.title: Digital Stocking Stuffers - $1 or less digital products
nodes.author: Andrew Kamphey

localize.description: 下载各种可以通过电子邮件发送给朋友和家人的好东西。不要在商场里闲逛，滚动清单。呆在家里，把你的礼物通过电子邮件寄给你最喜欢的自助者、自助者和独立黑客，这样可以拯救生命。
localize.tagline: 1美元或更低的数字产品

localize.description: 下載各種可以通過電子郵件發送給朋友和家人的好東西。不要在商場裏閒逛，滾動清單。呆在家裏，把你的禮物通過電子郵件寄給你最喜歡的自助者、自助者和獨立黑客，這樣可以拯救生命。
localize.tagline: 1美元或更低的數字產品

nodes.excerpt: We designed Yak Tack to help you boost your vocabulary in a matter of days. We use a simple, scientifically proven technique called spaced repetition to get people past the "Ebbinghaus Forgetting Curve" when learning new words.
nodes.title: Yak Tack: Mobile App - Broaden your vocabulary. Simply.
nodes.author: Jeremy Thomas

localize.description: 我们设计的Yak Tack可以帮助你在几天内增加词汇量。我们使用一种简单的、经过科学验证的技术，称为间隔重复，让人们在学习新单词时越过“艾宾豪斯遗忘曲线”。
localize.tagline: 扩大你的词汇量。很简单。

localize.description: 我們設計的Yak Tack可以幫助你在幾天內增加詞彙量。我們使用一種簡單的、經過科學驗證的技術，稱爲間隔重複，讓人們在學習新單詞時越過“艾賓豪斯遺忘曲線”。
localize.tagline: 擴大你的詞彙量。很簡單。

nodes.excerpt: Is Woofbuzz just another dog training app? No. It is a full platform that will provide answers to ALL of your canine queries. Yes, we provide free behavioral content, all originally illustrated, but Woofbuzz goes a lot further than this.
nodes.title: Woofbuzz - Provides tools to ensure your dog’s daily needs are met
nodes.author: Alexander Adam

localize.description: Woofbuzz只是另一款训练狗的应用程序吗？不是的。这是一个完整的平台，将为您的所有犬类查询提供答案。是的，我们提供免费的行为内容，都是最初的插图，但Woofbuzz做得更远。
localize.tagline: 提供工具以确保您的狗狗的日常需要得到满足

nodes.excerpt: 1Question asks a quick study question before granting children access to their favorite apps...like sneaking vegetables into cake! Instead of complete restriction, 1Question creates unlimited opportunities for children to learn as they play.
nodes.title: 1Question - Turning your child's screen time into study time!
nodes.author: Ann Elnekave

localize.description: 在给孩子们访问他们最喜欢的应用程序之前，问题会问一个快速学习的问题……比如把蔬菜偷偷放到蛋糕里！1Query不是完全的限制，而是为孩子们创造了无限的机会，让他们在游戏中学习。
localize.tagline: 把孩子看电视的时间变成学习时间！

localize.tagline: 把孩子看電視的時間變成學習時間！

nodes.excerpt: Stop spending a lot of time searching templates for documents in multiple sectors including IT, Business, HR, Legal, Medicine, Education, and Finance. Use Fastdok to generate ready-to-use documents that work in minutes by answering a few questions.
nodes.title: Fastdok - Generate documents that work in a few minutes
nodes.author: Ayoub Moustaid

localize.description: 停止花费大量时间在多个部门(包括IT、商业、人力资源、法律、医疗、教育和金融)的模板中搜索文档。使用Fastdok生成即用型文档，只需回答几个问题，即可在几分钟内完成工作。
localize.tagline: 生成只需几分钟即可工作的文档

localize.description: 停止花費大量時間在多個部門(包括IT、商業、人力資源、法律、醫療、教育和金融)的模板中搜索文檔。使用Fastdok生成即用型文檔，只需回答幾個問題，即可在幾分鐘內完成工作。
localize.tagline: 生成只需幾分鐘即可工作的文檔

nodes.title: Beacon - Calculate a webpages footprint what you can do to about it.
nodes.author: Chris Butterworth

localize.description: 计算网站对环境的影响，查看故障，并了解可以采取哪些措施来改善它。
localize.tagline: 计算网页足迹，您可以为此做些什么。

localize.description: 計算網站對環境的影響，查看故障，並瞭解可以採取哪些措施來改善它。
localize.tagline: 計算網頁足跡，您可以爲此做些什麼。

nodes.excerpt: Finally, a flashcard app that just works—for iOS and macOS. Thoughtfully designed, Fresh Cards is a joy to use. Using a swipe interface, card review is quick and best of all, cards are auto-scheduled for review again based on how well you did.
nodes.title: Fresh Cards - Flashcards that just work
nodes.author: Allen Ussher

localize.description: 最后，一款适用于iOS和MacOS的闪存卡应用程序。设计周到的新卡使用起来是一件令人愉悦的事情。使用刷卡界面，卡片审查速度很快，最棒的是，卡片会根据您的表现自动安排再次审查。
localize.tagline: 工作正常的抽认卡

localize.description: 最後，一款適用於iOS和MacOS的閃存卡應用程序。設計周到的新卡使用起來是一件令人愉悅的事情。使用刷卡界面，卡片審查速度很快，最棒的是，卡片會根據您的表現自動安排再次審查。
localize.tagline: 工作正常的抽認卡
